name: Scratch 1D Noise Simulation
description:
1-dimensional noise simulation

--NOTES--

If the min is greater than the max, then the line will go down, being faster for how much min is bigger. It is the same thing with max.

The smaller the values, the smoother the line. the higher the values, the more jagged the line is, and you can see the lines better.

(Built-in Scratch)

Clone Sim: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/571655179/

Normal Sim: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/570777347/
